itemDisplayName: Deploy Moodle on Ubuntu on a single VM.
description: This template deploys Moodle as a LAMP application on Ubuntu. It creates a single Ubuntu VM and does a silent install of MySQL, Apache and PHP on it. It then deploys Moodle, and if selected, the Microsoft Office 365 plugins for Moodle on it. After the deployment is successful, you can go to /moodle to start congfiguring Moodle.
summary: Deploy Moodle on Ubuntu on a single VM.
